formatDescription: Asylum Music Format files (.amf) are music files used in 1990s MS-DOS games Crusader: No Remorse and Crusader: No Regret. Developed by Otto Chrons, they store song data and audio samples.
provenanceCompoundName: The National Archives and Records Administration / The National Archives and Records Administration

internalSignatures.name: Asylum Music Format
